name: Wacky Wavy Inflatable Tube Man Extreme
name_original: Wacky Wavy Inflatable Tube Man Extreme
description:
Description:

Have you ever wanted to be a wacky wavy inflatable tube man? What about a wacky wavy inflatable tube man who plays beach volleyball with a friend??! In this game you can do just that. Created in 48 hours for the 2017 Global Game Jam.

Controls:

  • Player1:
    • WASD to control characters
    • S to confirm
    • W to cancel
  • Player2:
    • Arrow keys to control character
    • Down to confirm
    • Up to cancel
  • Xbox Controller support for PC and Mac builds
    • Left and right joystick control arms
    • DPad to select character
    • Start for menu
    • Back to quit

Credits:

  • Ted Dinola - Programmer and Audio
  • Vu Ha - Programmer
  • Scott Anderson - Programmer
  • Rose Peng - Lead Artist
  • Chris Palacios - Artist and Audio
